https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/33CyP7R7Nq405PqmlHaIh2Sl8ks.jpg A girl is raped by her teacher. Her cop sister arrests him and he was brought to justice. But when he is certified as a mental patient, he is released from custody and the women are once again in danger. Beast of Tutor
